001package reciprocal.linear.vector;
002
003import static com.google.common.base.Preconditions.checkArgument;
004import static java.util.Objects.requireNonNull;
005
006import java.io.Serial;
007import java.io.Serializable;
008import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
009
010/**
011 * Entry for vectors
012 *
013 * @param <E> element
014 * @param index index
015 * @param element element
016 * @since 0.0.1
017 */
018public record VectorEntry<E extends Number>(int index, @NotNull E element) implements Serializable {
019    @Serial
020    private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
021
022    /**
023     * Constructor
024     *
025     * @param index index
026     * @param element element
027     * @throws IllegalArgumentException when {@code index <= 0}
028     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code element == null}
029     * @since 0.0.1
030     */
031    public VectorEntry {
032        checkArgument(index > 0, "index > 0 expected but index = %s", index);
033        requireNonNull(element, "element");
034    }
035
036    /**
037     * Returns a copy with new newIndex
038     *
039     * @param newIndex newIndex
040     * @return copy
041     * @throws IllegalArgumentException when {@code newIndex < 1}
042     * @since 0.0.1
043     */
044    public @NotNull VectorEntry<@NotNull E> withIndex(final int newIndex) {
045        return new VectorEntry<>(newIndex, element);
046    }
047
048    /**
049     * Returns a copy with new newElement
050     *
051     * @param newElement newElement
052     * @return copy
053     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code newElement == null}
054     * @since 0.0.1
055     */
056    public @NotNull VectorEntry<@NotNull E> withElement(final @NotNull E newElement) {
057        requireNonNull(newElement, "newElement");
058        return new VectorEntry<>(index, newElement);
059    }
060}
